title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.2 - Application

State Regulations
(a) The requirements of this part shall apply to a mobile home park maintained for the placement of five or more mobile and/or manufactured homes except; (1)
a mobile home park at which the owner/operator receives no remuneration for any occupancy thereof; or
(2)
any mobile home park operation determined by the State Commissioner of Health as not being within the intent or regulation of this Part. (b) The requirements of this Part shall not apply to a migrant labor camp as defined in Part 15 of this Title or to a temporary residence as defined in Subpart 7-1 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
17.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
